|brand = Planex |model = GW-US54S |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = G |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = G54 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = dongle
|vendor_id = 2019 |device_id = c002 |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = Atheros;AR5523; |chip2 = Atheros;AR2112; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = No |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |802dot11_protocols = bg |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = EoL |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Drivers also reference 0cf3:0001 as sharing the same identification ("GW-US54SG Wireless Network USB Adapter").
